name: politico
text:
Donald Trump knows he's losing. 

The president has privately come to that grim realization in recent days, according to multiple people close to him
https://t.co/Vnc7EdsRM2

name: politico
text:
How has the pandemic made us rethink efforts to build a sustainable future for generations to come? –  Find out in "The Long Game," a weekly look at the latest sustainability news, trends, and solutions. Subscribe today. 
https://t.co/OHT9x73kHG https://t.co/9YkabJso3d

name: politico
text:
On the pandemic’s first peak in early April, states that voted for  Hillary Clinton accounted for 67% of new Covid-19 cases.

For the newest peak, states that voted for Donald Trump have an even larger share: They accounted for 73% of new cases on June 28 https://t.co/4UJPYkKeD4 https://t.co/jeq10CbBPP

name: politico
text:
Top Trump administration officials say drug overdose deaths are surging amid the coronavirus pandemic, driven by increased substance use due to anxiety, social isolation and depression

https://t.co/ys5eWqfp0N

name: politico
text:
UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson will chart Britain’s post-coronavirus future — by dusting down his previous plan.

His pledge is to "build, build, build" in the hope that Britain can dig itself out of the economic crisis wrought by the virus
https://t.co/atcmENa16d

name: politico
text:
Senate Republicans are vowing to get to the bottom of bombshell reports that Russia offered bounties to Afghan militants for targeted killings of U.S. troops overseas — and suggesting that retaliation against Moscow may be in order

https://t.co/G9aJa9sEoL

name: politico
text:
When former Utah Gov. Jon Huntsman launched a bid for his old job last November, his entry to the race elicited one immediate question: Why?

Now, on the eve of the state's Republican primary, many GOP voters are asking that very question
https://t.co/CRvtnAPzqi

name: politico
text:
Analysis: Big Tech is cracking down on Donald Trump, which gives him all the more reason to retreat from its platforms into his own digital ecosystem

https://t.co/ylw6cbUtBO

name: politico
text:
After weeks of celebrating states that reopened, Mike Pence and others on Monday changed course — commending governors who slowed their plans

https://t.co/rgUbwGYySg

name: politico
text:
The Treasury Department announced Monday that it will not be moving the tax-filing deadline for a second time, despite some pressure to do so because of the coronavirus pandemic

https://t.co/jknD3s2J7U

name: politico
text:
Hickenlooper has stumbled in Colorado's Senate race. He apologized for racially insensitive comments, and he was cited for contempt by the state ethics panel, which found he violated ethics laws as governor.

He could still advance to the general election
https://t.co/SUXTbLWQPI

name: politico
text:
New Jersey will not allow restaurants to reopen for indoor dining this week as originally planned, following spikes of coronavirus cases in other states that have reopened on a more aggressive timeline
https://t.co/0JXo14pCqN

name: politico
text: Two national progressive groups will publish an open letter to Joe Biden today urging him to select Elizabeth Warren as his running mate https://t.co/JIazQCcq1Q

text: The owner of The Hill helped arrange his wife's unpaid advisory role in Melania Trump's office https://t.co/6HWif5DFy9

name: politico
text: A group of nearly a dozen House Democrats will head to the White House this morning for a briefing on intelligence that Russia provided bounties to Taliban militants to kill U.S. troops in Afghanistan https://t.co/xUi1bEK1iR

name: politico
text: Fox News’ Steve Doocy implored President Trump this morning to wear a mask in public to model best practices for Americans. “‘MAGA’ should now stand for ‘Masks Are Great Again.’ Let me give you some marketing advice right there,” he said. https://t.co/pxsM6OVMYe https://t.co/VKQ1d85Pm2

name: politico
text:
RT @ec_schneider: Club for Growth w/ TV ad attacking @ProjectLincoln, airing on Washington, DC, cable. 

"These are the same disgraced consultants who ran the McCain and Romney campaign..." ad says. 

https://t.co/AuhYqaFV2v

Read how they're getting under Trump's skin: https://t.co/LijCty6JES

name: politico
text: The Trump administration is increasingly pinning its hopes on a vaccine that may never come, pouring $10 billion into Operation Warp Speed https://t.co/3SKI3Uy4E3

name: politico
text: Using data from the COVID Tracking Project, we’re following how each state is responding to Covid-19. Here's where we stand this morning. https://t.co/r0HDQiaN3Z https://t.co/notVuS9jdv

name: politico
text: The data isn’t perfect. Since the CDC hasn’t yet begun publicly releasing the number of people who have been tested, The COVID Tracking Project is pulling data from state health departments, which can vary in the way they report tests and infections. https://t.co/r0HDQhTbFp https://t.co/RdjZVcMdG4

name: politico
text: Both progressives and conservatives are confident they can use the Supreme Court's 5-4 ruling on abortion to rally their voters going into 2020 and are pouring tens of millions into the effort  https://t.co/lxmxMwCIaJ

name: politico
text: RT @heatherscope: "The president called this a hoax publicly. name: politico
text:

Hoyer says he wants members of Congress to be briefed "by the intelligence community directly," rather than WH employees.
